name: Rage Golf (ArthanGameDev@official)
description:
Rage Golf         

Rage Golf is a 2d rpg game and also good for rage quiting. 

Right now there are only 4 levels I will update it soon. 

                            How to play?

Click the opposite angle where you want your ball to go to. 

Also the farther you click the faster the ball goes. 

                                  Credits

Game by:ArthanGameDev@official

Sounds by: forgot the website name :/

Graphics by:ArthanGameDev@official

                                 That's all
